restaurant.name: Loose Moose
restaurant.description: A modern Australian pub offering fresh, locally-sourced dishes with creative twists on classic favorites. From gourmet burgers to premium steaks, our menu celebrates bold flavors and quality ingredients.
restaurant.welcomeMessage: G'day! Welcome to Loose Moose! I'm your digital mate here to help you explore our delicious menu and get your order sorted. What can I get started for you today?

faqs.question: Do you cater to dietary restrictions?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free options clearly marked on our menu. Please let us know about any allergies when ordering.

faqs.question: What are your opening hours?
faqs.answer: We're open daily from 11:30 AM to 10:00 PM for food service, and our bar stays open until late.

faqs.question: Do you take bookings?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take bookings for groups of 6 or more. For smaller groups, we operate on a walk-in basis.

faqs.question: Are kids welcome?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We have a dedicated kids menu and welcome families. Kids must be supervised at all times.

faqs.question: Do you have gluten-free options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gluten-free pizza bases and have several naturally gluten-free dishes. Please inform our staff of any allergies.
